text:
#8150054
What does the Real California Milk Seal mean?
Page - 1
This sampling program is probably different from any other that you have been involved 
with.  While today you are distributing samples of Joseph Farms Cheese, it is imperative 
that you also communicate the benefits of products that carry the Real California Milk 
Seal. The benefits of products with the Real California Milk Seal include the following.  
•The California Advisory Board is tasked with promoting dairy products made with 100% 
Real California Milk.  
•The Real California Milk Seal can be found on dairy products like milk, butter, cheese, 
ice cream, and more.  This unique round, yellow and black seal is a certified Mark of 
Distinction (similar to the USDA Organic Seal which includes regulatory oversight).  
There are thousands of products that have the RCM seal on their package today.
•The RCM seal gives shoppers assurance that their dairy products are made with 
high-quality, nutritious dairy.  When shoppers buy RCM dairy products, they are 
supporting multi-generational, family-owned businesses that are on the forefront of 
sustainable dairy farming practices. 
California Milk Advisory Board        
Joseph Farms @ Food4Less - #8150054
 
      

#8150054
Page - 2
Objectives and Talking Points:
Your Goals Today
•To make shoppers aware of the Real California Milk seal and the variety of cheeses and other dairy 
products produced in California.
•To encourage shoppers to use the Real California Milk coupons to purchase Joseph Farms Cheese 
products.
Talking Points - Real California Milk Products  
•California leads the nation in sustainable dairy farming.
•Real California Milk products are made with 100% Real California Milk.
•99% of California’s dairy farms are family owned and operated, most being multi-generational farmers.
Talking Points – Joseph Farms Cheese Products  
•What began as a small family farm has now grown into an internationally recognized brand, sold 
across the United States, and around the world, including Europe, Latin America, Africa, and Asia. The 
Joseph Farms label symbolizes all natural, (No Artificial Hormones including rBST) world-class 
quality cheese, and is the trusted brand of choice for customers around the world.
•Joseph Farms master cheese makers use generations of experience to slowly craft each cheese, 
ensuring the uncompromised quality and delicious mouth-watering flavors that have earned 
countless awards. Their cheese is then aged to perfection in a carefully controlled environment, which 
develops the unique flavor of each of our varieties.
•Provides an excellent source of calcium. 
•Naturally gluten-free.

California Milk Advisory Board

#8150054
Page - 4
• Demo Table
• Black Tablecloth
• Apron
• Entire Kit Contents
• Paperwork and Pen (to complete paperwork)
• Cooler
• Scissors
• Allergy & Ingredient Sheet

What to Bring:
What to Wear:
•Black pants/skirt
•Retailer approved uniform
•Apron
•Black, close-toed non-slip shoes 
(no open-toed shoes or gym shoes)
•Face Mask 
•Agency approved hair restraint
•200 Real California Milk BrandedNapkins
•300 2-oz Souffle Cups
•300 Spoons
•3 Pairs of Gloves
•1 Easel Card-Real California Milk Logo
•1 EaselCard-The California Difference
•100 Real California Milk Coupons
Kit Contents: please verify all are included

#8150054
Page - 5
On-Site Checklist:
•Arrive on time to your store on the day of the event.  Introduce yourself to the store manager to briefly describe 
the event.
•Purchase the featured Joseph Farms Cheese products that you will be sampling today (Page 3).
•Note the beginning inventory of the featured Joseph Farms cheese products and record it on your 
PromoReports form (if applicable). *DO NOT INCLUDE THE PRODUCT PURCHASED FOR SAMPLING.*   
(At the end of the event, please remember to record the ending inventory of the featured products.)
•Check to see if there is a secondary display of the products being sampled. If possible, set up your event table 
near where the featured products are stocked.
• Read and understand all of the information in this training manual.
•  Review your kit contents for accuracy.
• Conduct your pre-call to the store 3 days before your event and ask
    the receiving clerk if the product is in stock.
The following Pre-Event Checklist must be completed prior to your event:

#8150054
TABLE BRANDING
Real California Milk Coupon
Page - 6
Real California Milk
 Easel Card
The California Difference
Easel Card

#8150054
Arrive on time to your store on the day 
of your event. Upon arrival, introduce 
yourself to the store manager. 
Walk through the store to see if there is 
a display of the featured Real 
California Milk products. Please try to 
set up as close to the sampled products 
as possible. If a Real California Milk 
display is present, please try and set 
up near the display as a first priority.
As soon as you arrive at the store, 
please purchase all of the products 
listed on page 3 for sampling.
Begin setting up your table with the 
Branded Napkins, Easel Cards, Real 
California Milk Coupons, and allergen 
sheet (last page of this Training 
Manual).
Event Set Up Instructions:
Page - 7

#8150054
•While wearing the gloves from your event kit, unwrap the package of Joseph Farms 
Cheddar Jack Shredded, Joseph Farms Queso Quesadilla Shredded, and Joseph 
Farms Mexican Blend.
•Using a spoon from your demo kit, fill souffle cups approximately 1/4 full with each of 
the above products. (See Image A for the approximate amount of shreds to place in 
the souffle cup). DO NOT combine the featured products into the same souffle 
cup.  Each variety should be placed in a separate souffle cup.
•Place a spoon in each souffle cup before serving to shoppers for tasting.  (See 
Image B.) 
•Keep 3-4 samples of each product on your table available for shoppers to sample.  
•Distribute samples to interested shoppers along with a money saving coupon, while 
reciting the features and benefits (page 2) of purchasing a product with the 
Real California Milk seal, as well as the featured Joseph Farms Cheese 
products.  
•Keep all unused packages of Joseph Farms shredded cheeses not currently being 
used for sampling in the cooler to ensure they stay chilled.
•Replenish samples as needed to accommodate store traffic.
*** ENCOURAGE SHOPPERS TO TRY ALL JOSEPH FARMS CHEESE PRODUCTS 
AVAILABLE FOR SAMPLING. ***
Sampling Instructions:
Page - 8
Image A
Image B

NOTE: Please follow standard safety/health procedures when conducting your demo. Do not distribute samples to children. 
Hand the sample to the parent or guardian to give to the child.
ALLERGY WARNING: We encourage consumers to check the ingredient statement on each package of the product they 
sample for the most up-to-date information on the ingredients contained in that product. 
You must have your Allergen signs (from this Training Manual and/or in your kit) displayed on the front of the table during your 
sampling event.
Please recycle your consumer engagement materials when possible.
Page - 9
#8150054
Post Event: 
•DO NOT take the sampled product out of the store.
•Dispose of any leftover samples once your sampling event is complete.
•Please leave any remaining coupons with the Store Manager.
•Clean up, breakdown your table and leave your area as you found it.
•Complete your PromoReports® Form and obtain a store stamp and a manager’s signature.
•It is mandatory that you enter your results online to report your results upon event completion.  For online 
entry, please follow the instructions on your PromoReports® form. If you are purchasing product, do NOT 
include the product you are purchasing in your inventory count.
•Retain your PromoReports® Form for 1 year after calling in your results.

This page has been intentionally left blank.
Page - 10
#8150054

real_california_milk: California leads the nation in sustainable dairy farming.
Real California Milk products are made with 100% Real California Milk.
99% of California's dairy farms are family owned and operated, most being multi-generational farmers.
joseph_farms_cheese: What began as a small family farm has now grown into an internationally recognized brand, sold across the United States, and around the world, including Europe, Latin America, Africa, and Asia. The Joseph Farms label symbolizes all natural, (No Artificial Hormones including rBST) world-class quality cheese, and is the trusted brand of choice for customers around the world.

Joseph Farms master cheese makers use generations of experience to slowly craft each cheese, ensuring the uncompromised quality and delicious mouth-watering flavors that have earned countless awards. Their cheese is then aged to perfection in a carefully controlled environment, which develops the unique flavor of each of our varieties.
Provides an excellent source of calcium.
